executable.title: Annotations
executable.description: Create and edit annotations, supplementary information associated with a scene. Currently supported annotations are fiducial points, rulers, and regions of interest (ROIs).
executable.contributor: Nicole Aucoin (SPL, BWH), Daniel Haehn (SPL, BWH), Kilian Pohl (UPenn), Yong Zhang (IBM), Wendy Plesniak (SPL, BWH)
executable.acknowledgements: The research was funded by an ARRA supplement to NIH NCRR (P41 RR13218).This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149.

parameter.label: Edit
parameter.description: Edit the properties of all the annotations in the scene

parameter.label: Select All Button
parameter.description: Select all annotations and hierarchies

parameter.label: Unselect All Button
parameter.description: Unselect all annotations and hierarchies

parameter.label: Visible Selected Button
parameter.description: Toggle the visibility of highlighted Annotations. Hierarchies are ignored.

parameter.label: Lock Selected Button
parameter.description: Lock or unlock highlighted annotations. Hierarchies are ignored.

parameter.label: Jump Slices Button
parameter.description: Reset slice views to the first coordinate of the highlighted annotation.

parameter.label: Add HierarchyButton
parameter.description: Create a new hierarchy. If a hierarchy is currently highlighted, the new one will be a sub-hierarchy

parameter.label: Generate Report
parameter.description: Display a report of highlighted annotations

parameter.label: Delete Selected Button
parameter.description: Delete highlighted annotations. Hierarchies have to single selected to get deleted.

parameter.label: Active list
parameter.description: The name of the currently active list, which controls which list new annotations will be added to. If the top level All Annotations list is active, the module will automatically create separate lists for each type of annotation. Click on a hierarchy in the tree view to make it active and to add new annotations to it.

parameter.label: Visible Hierarchy Button
parameter.description: Set all annotations in active list visible

parameter.label: Invisible Hierarchy Button
parameter.description: Set all annotations in active list invisible

parameter.label: Lock Hierarchy Button
parameter.description: Set all annotations in active list locked

parameter.label: Unlock Hierarchy Button
parameter.description: Set all annotations in active list to be unlocked

parameter.label: Selected
parameter.description: Selected annotations can be passed to command line modules.

parameter.label: Color
parameter.description: Shows the color for the annotation, open the properties panel to pick a new one

parameter.label: Vis
parameter.description: Click on this button (eye open or closed) to toggle the visibility of the annotation in the 2D and 3D views

parameter.label: Lock
parameter.description: Click on this button to make the annotation be locked into place, not responding to mouse events. This is useful if you need to manipulate other things in the scene.

parameter.label: Edit
parameter.description: Click on the icon in the Edit column to bring up the Modify Annotation Properties dialog box

parameter.label: Value
parameter.description: A useful value associated with the annotation (location for fiducials, length for rulers)

parameter.label: Name
parameter.description: The name of the annotation, usually kept short, one letter and a number, as it's displayed in the 3D and 2D windows.

parameter.label: Description
parameter.description: A longer text describing this annotation

parameter.label: Type
parameter.description: The class type for this annotation hierarchy

parameter.label: Color
parameter.description: Click on this button to bring up a color picker widget to set the color used for all annotations in this hierarchy when the hierarchy is collapsed (not implemented yet)

parameter.label: Apply to List
parameter.description: If this checkbox is ticked, change the color on all the annotations in this hierarchy. Default true.

parameter.label: Visibility
parameter.description: Click on this button (eye open or closed) to toggle the visibility of the annotations in this hierarchy in the 2D and 3D views.

parameter.label: Name
parameter.description: The name of the annotation hierarchy, describing the annotations below it.

parameter.label: Description
parameter.description: A longer text describing this annotation hierarchy

parameter.label: Type
parameter.description: The class type for this annotation, is it a fiducial, ruler, region of interest?

parameter.label: Color
parameter.description: Click on this button to bring up a color picker widget to set the color for all parts of the annotation (text, glyphs, lines)

parameter.label: Visibility
parameter.description: Click on this button (eye open or closed) to toggle the visibility of the annotation in the 2D and 3D views.

parameter.label: Lock
parameter.description: Click on this button to make the annotation be locked into place, not responding to mouse events. This is useful if you need to manipulate other things in the scene.

parameter.label: Name
parameter.description: The name of the annotation, usually kept short, one letter and a number, as it's displayed in the 3D and 2D windows.

parameter.label: Size
parameter.description: Click on the small, Medium, Large buttons to change the scaling of the annotation

parameter.label: RAS
parameter.description: The world coordinates of this annotation in the default Slicer Right-Anterior-Superior coordinate system. Double click to edit the values

parameter.label: Description
parameter.description: A longer text describing this annotation

parameter.label: Text
parameter.description: Set the descriptive text, text color, scale, opacity on this panel

parameter.label: Points
parameter.description: Set the coordinate location of the point(s), glyph color, scale, glyph type, opacity, ambient, diffuse, specular material properites on this panel

parameter.label: Lines
parameter.description: This panel is only enabled for rulers. Set the line color, label visibility, label position along the line (from 0-1), tick spacing, maximum number of ticks, opacity, ambient, diffuse, specular material properites on this panel

parameter.label: ROI
parameter.description: This panel is only enabled for regions of interest. Set the ranges for the ROI along it's axes, LR, PA, IS. Toggle the ROI visibility and if it's updated interactively on this panel

parameter.label: Annotations toolbar
parameter.description: Create new annotations by selecting them from the drop down menu. Return to rotate mouse mode by clicking on the rotate idcon. Toggle persistent placement of annotations by checking and unchecking the Persistent checkbox
